value.0: Bugger off, Imperial! I've no desire to speak with you!
<StartAction>[The hooded thug looks at you a bit suspiciously.]</Start> I might be... what's it to you?
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> <StartAction>[Mylok gives you an evil grin.]</Start> You are a fool if you think you can threaten me! And now you shall learn your lesson the hard way...

<StartAction>[Success] [Mylok blinks slowly, nodding his head as you speak.]</Start> Of c-c-course, <sir/madam>... Let me just see where I p-put it... <StartAction>[Mylok fumbles in his pockets, and hands a gleaming amulet into your hands.]</Start>
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> <StartAction>[You fail to notice anything of interest in Mylok's possession.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Mylok seems to be very wary of you now.]</Start> What do you want with me?! Speak your business quickly, or begone from my presence!
<StartAction>[Success]</Start> <StartAction>[You notice a thin chain poking out of Mylok's pocket, likely attached to just such a brooch as the one you are looking for.]</Start>

<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> <StartAction>[Just as your hand closes over the chain, Mylok grabs your wrist.]</Start> Thought you would steal from Mylok, eh? Well, my friend, you shall sorely regret THAT mistake...

<StartAction>[Success] [You manage to slip your hand around the chain in Mylok's pocket without drawing his attention. You quickly place the brooch in your pocket, and he seems none too aware of your theft.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Mylok gives you one last suspicious glare, but you manage to walk away before he can think any more of your actions.]</Start>

<StartAction>[Mylok continues to stare at you suspiciously for a moment, but then shrugs.]</Start> Yeah, I won a soul brooch from a fool of a Minotaur the other day. The stupid beast couldn't even realize I had rigged our card game against him!
Sure, if you have enough gold. I think 75 gold pieces ought to be about right...
Then I am afraid you are out of luck...
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I don't think so, my friend. Give me 75 gold, or the deal's off.
<StartAction>[Success]</Start> I suppose 50 gold pieces will suffice. <StartAction>[In exchange for the gold pieces, Mylok hands over the soul brooch belonging to Ghan the Minotaur.]</Start>

<StartAction>[In exchange for the gold pieces, Mylok hands over the soul brooch belonging to Ghan.]</Start> Now, if our business here is complete, I ask that you remove your Imperial stench from my presence!
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if "N_MODULE_STAGE" is 0. >>
<< This conversation node does nothing but reset the variable "N_TALK_SWITCH" >>
<< Set owner's journal quest to "JT_PREL_TARI" >>
<StartAction>[Leave the man be.]</Start>
Excuse me, but are you the one they call Mylok?
<StartAction>[Intimidate]</Start> I have come for the soul brooch; You shall give it to me now!
<StartAction>[Spot] [Attempt to see if you can spot the brooch in Mylok's possession.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Pick Pocket]</Start> <StartAction>[Attempt to pick Mylok's pocket.]</Start>
Sorry to have bothered you, but I must be on my way...
I have heard that you might be able to aid me in finding a magical pendant called a "soul brooch." I have need of one, and supposedly you won just such an item the other day.
Do you suppose I might buy the brooch from you?
I don't have that kind of gold to spend right now.
<StartAction>[Leave.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Persuade]</Start> How about 50 gold? I think that is more than enough for such a brooch.
Here's the 75 gold. <StartAction>[Hand the gold over to Mylok.]</Start>
